title: Improve diff-based release pipelines using file-router and checksums
description:
Fix and enhance the release version pipelines to:
- Use file-router.json to scope diffs
- Filter .md/.yaml/.json/.txt updates across memory, logs, models, goals
- Use SHA256 checksums + timestamps to determine changes
- Patch and register missing file routes
- Generate accurate diff-based ZIPs
- Update memory bank, release metadata, and agent logs
